title: Bloomberg Markets: Why Streaming Services Love Stand-Up Comedy
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Why Streaming Services Love Stand-Up Comedy
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Brian Volk Weiss President Comedy Dynamics Discussing why Netflix and other streaming services are spending so much on stand-up comedy.
